mapper.select: SELECT num, writer, title, orgFileName, fileSize, regdate FROM board_file ORDER BY num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_file (num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate) VALUES(board_file_seq.NEXTVAL, writer=#{writer}, title=#{title}, orgFileName=#{orgFileName}, saveFileName=#{saveFileName}, fileSize=#{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
